casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Luna, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Luna (1996), 75 Ohio St.3d 215.]

(No. 95-2288 Submitted February 6, 1996 Decided March 5, 1996.) Michael K. Luna, pro se. Per Curiam.

We affirm the decision of the court of appeals for the reason stated in its judgment entry.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur.
